title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2001 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly increasing from 2003 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2005, slightly increasing from 2005 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2012, and lastly rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 357.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 132.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2001 to 2010.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2018.
